participant_1.name: Nanette
participant_1.background: I was a librarian, but I lost my job because I was always forgetting where I put things. I spent my last birthday at the library with Nanette. I have several children. I live a lie. I would not be able to teach if I were blind because I would not be able to see my students or the blackboard.

participant_2.name: Max
participant_2.background: I like music that reminds me of my family and friends. I miss my dog, but I have a new friend in my cat. I will go to Comic Con if I can wear my favorite hoodie. I try to stay active and keep my mind busy to avoid feeling anxious. I'd love to have lunch with George Lucas and talk about the powers of crystals in Star Wars.

content.text: Hi I am Nanette. I just lost my job as a librarian because I was always forgetting where I put things.
Oh no, that is too bad. I hope you can find a new job soon.
Thank you. I am trying to stay positive.
That is good. I am sure you will find something soon.
Oh, I see. I have a cat and I miss my dog.
Me too. I am a big Star Wars fan.
That is cool. I am not really into Star Wars.
Oh, that is too bad. I would love to have lunch with George Lucas and talk about the powers of crystals in Star Wars.
I guess I am just not a big fan of sci-fi.
That is okay. I have friends who are not into Star Wars either.
Yes, I love music. I like music that reminds me of my family and friends.
Me too. I like music that reminds me of my children.
That is nice. I am sure you are a great mother.
Thank you. I try my best
